entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
